sentence.Network_en: A North American food fish ( Salmo gairdneri ) having a reddish longitudinal band and black spots.
sentence.Network_cn: 北美的一种食用鱼, ( 虹鳟硬头鳟 ),有红色的纵向条纹和黑色的斑点.
